name: Stunt Fest
description:
Welcome to Stunt Fest! Stunt Fest is an arcade game where your only target is to perform silly and crazy stuns to get to the finish line! If you had a lot of fun playing old classic and new ragdoll games than Stunt Fest is just what you need!

In Stunt Fest there are not much rules: you've got only few kicks to get your character to the finish. If you can do it, than the level is completed. That's it, that easy! But there will be a lot of obstacles and traps on your way like bombs, mines, explosive barrels and so on! We've got a few levels for you to play but this is not all! There will be much more and we are going to add level editor so the limit of fun will be limitless!

If you like ragdoll physics games, if you like to have fun and laugh when playing games than Stunt Fest is perfect pick for you! Get the game and enjoy playing it! Good luck!
